question:
Currently, with which of the following countries, India has an Open Sky Agreement with no restriction on number of flights, seats or destinations to / from that /those country / countries?
  1. United States
  2. Australia
  3. UK
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: There is no restriction on number of flights, seats or destinations to / from United States. India has open-sky with UK with restriction on frequencies with respects to flights to and from Mumbai and Delhi. For some tourist destinations of ASEAN, India has limited open sky policy. India has also entered into bilateral agreements with more than 100 countries over landing points, traffic rights, seasons, capacity etc.
